flavorText: A mimic's disguise fools its victims just long enough to draw them within range of its venomous tentacles.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Tarnung eines Nachäffers soll seine Opfer nur so lange in die Irre führen, bis sie in Reichweite seiner giftigen Tentakel sind.
foreignData.name: Waldschleicher-Nachäffer
foreignData.text: Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch spielst, der sowohl schwarz als auch grün ist, wird der Waldschleicher-Nachäffer 4/5 und erhält Verdorren (beides bis zum Ende des Zuges). (Er fügt Kreaturen Schaden in Form von -1/-1-Marken zu.)

foreignData.flavorText: El disfraz de un mímico engaña a sus víctimas lo suficiente como para atraerlos al alcance de sus tentáculos venenosos.
foreignData.name: Mímico acechamadera
foreignData.text: Siempre que juegues un hechizo que sea tanto negro como verde, el Mímico acechamadera se convierte en 4/5 y gana la habilidad de debilitar hasta el final del turno. (Hace daño a las criaturas en forma de contadores -1/-1.)

foreignData.flavorText: Le déguisement du mimique berne ses victimes suffisamment longtemps pour les mettre à portée de ses tentacules venimeux.
foreignData.name: Mimique guetteur du bois
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que vous jouez un sort qui est à la fois noir et vert, le Mimique guetteur du bois devient 4/5 et acquiert la flétrissure jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Il inflige des blessures aux créatures sous la forme de marqueurs -1/-1.)

foreignData.flavorText: Il mascheramento di un mimic inganna le sue vittime per il tempo necessario ad attirarle alla portata dei suoi tentacoli velenosi.
foreignData.name: Mimic Silvestre
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta giochi una magia nera e verde, il Mimic Silvestre diventa 4/5 e ha avvizzire fino alla fine del turno. (Una fonte con avvizzire infligge danno sotto forma di segnalini -1/-1.)

foreignData.flavorText: ミミックの化けた姿は、獲物が毒の触手の届く範囲まで近づくのに十分な程度までは人を騙せる。
foreignData.name: 森潜みのミミック
foreignData.text: あなたが黒であり緑である呪文をプレイするたび、森潜みのミミックはターン終了時まで４/５になるとともに萎縮を得る。 （それはクリーチャーに－１/－１カウンターの形でダメージを与える。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 多相の戦士

foreignData.flavorText: O disfarce de um mímico funciona apenas pelo tempo suficiente para que suas vítimas se aproximem de seus tentáculos venenosos.
foreignData.name: Mímico Espreitador do Bosque
foreignData.text: Toda vez que você joga uma mágica que é preta e verde, Mímico Espreitador do Bosque torna-se 4/5 e ganha murchar até o final do turno. (Ela causa dano a criaturas na forma de marcadores -1/-1.)

foreignData.flavorText: Обличье подражателя вводит его жертв в заблуждение ровно настолько, чтобы подманить их поближе к ядовитым щупальцам.
foreignData.name: Подражатель Лесной Засады
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание, которое одновременно является и черным и зеленым, Подражатель Лесной Засады становится 4/5 и получает Увядание до конца хода. (Он наносит повреждения существам в виде жетонов -1/-1.)

foreignData.flavorText: 拟态妖的伪装足以让对象毫无心防，然后走进其毒触手的攻击距离。
foreignData.name: 伏林拟态妖
foreignData.text: 每当你使用一个含黑绿双色的咒语时，伏林拟态妖成为4/5且获得乾枯异能直到回合结束。 （它会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。）

name: Woodlurker Mimic
originalText: Whenever you play a spell that's both black and green, Woodlurker Mimic becomes 4/5 and gains wither until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

rulings.text: The ability triggers whenever you cast a spell that’s both of its listed colors. It doesn’t matter whether that spell also happens to be any other colors.

If you cast a spell that’s the two appropriate colors for the second time in a turn, the ability triggers again. The Mimic will once again become the power and toughness stated in its ability, which could overwrite power- and toughness-setting effects that have been applied to it in the meantime.
Any other abilities the Mimic may have gained are not affected.

The effect from the ability overwrites other effects that set power and/or toughness if and only if those effects existed before the ability resolved. It will not overwrite effects that modify power or toughness (whether from a static ability, counters, or a resolved spell or ability), nor will it overwrite effects that set power and toughness which come into existence after the ability resolves. Effects that switch the creature’s power and toughness are always applied after any other power or toughness changing effects, including this one, regardless of the order in which they are created.

text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both black and green, Woodlurker Mimic has base power and toughness 4/5 until end of turn and gains wither until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
